name: ink-and-parchment-map
description: Online map for SMP Minecraft servers that don't want to spoil the need to explore.

scripts.postbuild: npm run minifyBuild && npm run outputRawLibs && npm run outputMinifiedLibs
scripts.outputMinifiedLibs: uglifyjs scripts/libs/csv.js  --comments --compress --mangle --lint --output ../www/js/csv.min.js && uglifyjs scripts/libs/StackBlur.js  --comments --compress --mangle --lint --output ../www/js/StackBlur.min.js && uglifyjs scripts/libs/jquery.mapz.js  --comments --compress --mangle --lint --output ../www/js/jquery.mapz.min.js
